channel.title: The NLnet Foundation funds two projects

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description:
making Tor easily usable by anyone, regardless of their internet connection speed, is a vital part of Tor's value and potential.

the hidden services feature is a really nice one, any way to make it even better than it already is would be welcome! another important consideration is the ease of configuration and use, and with those improvements it will continue and expand in the number of users taking of advantage of that great feature
